[vc_row row_height_percent=”50″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”261281″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″ uncode_shortcode_id=”801598″][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”115776″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″ uncode_shortcode_id=”871806″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ text_font=”font-113466″ uncode_shortcode_id=”578806″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Our Team[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-555555″ text_size=”h4″ text_weight=”400″ text_height=”fontheight-111852″ uncode_shortcode_id=”201650″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Meet Riccardo, Georgia and James. These are the key people who will be involved in shaping your new home.

 

Their unique approach to project management comes from a true passion for people, problem solving and celebrating the craftsmanship evident in truly design-focused construction.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″ mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”113272″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”577300″][vc_single_image media=”192″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”521026″][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”124960″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

Riccardo Ranieri

Design Development Manager

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”165902″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Over the past three decades, Ric has honed his craft in the design and construction industry.

A licensed builder, Ric has managed all forms of residential, industrial and commercial projects, from modest owner builder renovations to high-end, luxury dwellings. Ric’s family-oriented focus means clients can expect and receive a passionate and high level of personalised service.

Having worked with several multi-award winning builders and designers, Ric sets high standards for himself and the Harlan Homes team, leaving no stone unturned in the pursuit of building excellent homes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”120631″][vc_single_image media=”190″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”205776″][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”246552″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

Georgia Finnan

Project & Client Relationships Manager

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”170307″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]With a background in customer service and project coordination within the custom home building industry, Georgia’s passion is being involved in delivering beautiful family homes.

Georgia will be one of your main points of contact throughout your build, facilitating an exceptional and stress-free building experience.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”147911″][vc_single_image media=”191″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”171817″][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”636737″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

James Moore

Sales & Marketing Executive

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”198733″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]James has worked closely with Australia’s leading architects, interior designers and kitchen manufacturers for over 20 years.

With his deep understanding of the building process and unparalleled product knowledge, James can help make your dream build a reality.

James loves working with people and prides himself on his ability to build relationships based on knowledge, integrity
and trust.

James’ relentless commitment to customer satisfaction ensures the success of every project he takes on.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″ mobile_visibility=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”877560″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ desktop_visibility=”yes” medium_visibility=”yes” medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″ uncode_shortcode_id=”905697″][vc_single_image media=”388″ media_width_percent=”100″ alignment=”center” uncode_shortcode_id=”207645″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”100″ back_color=”color-105307″ back_image=”324″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ mobile_visibility=”yes” uncode_shortcode_id=”819532″ back_color_type=”uncode-palette” row_height_pixel=”300″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″ uncode_shortcode_id=”359999″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″][uncode_block id=”73″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
